bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Pathological Condition identical with leng li 冷利① , cold free-flux. Pu ji fang 普濟方 128: 芍藥之酸，通寒 利腹中痛 , “The sour nature of shao yao cures cold free-flux and abdominal pain”.

② Pharmacological Quality identical with leng li 冷利② , cold and disinhibiting. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry qie 茄 quotes Sheng sheng bian 生生編 : 茄性寒利，多食必腹痛下利 , “ Qie , its nature is cold [and] disinhibiting . If one consumes large amounts abdominal pain and free-flux discharge will be inevitable”.
